name: SOL Flowers
description: "$FLWR is the currency that supports the Sol Flower Garden world. All transactions in our garden will be performed in $FLWR. Future mints, NFT upgrades, physical items and AR downloads can only be purchased using $FLWR. SOL Flowers goal is to create and sustain a full virtual economy using $FLWR, as this is necessary to achieve certain daily volume and price goals to launch our Stable NFT (S-Nft) platform. A new way to offer instant liquidity based on floor value of specific categories tied to $FLWR"
